metadata.title: CVE-2015-1592 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Movable Type Pro, Open Source, and Advanced before 5.2.12 and Pro andAdvanced 6.0.x before 6.0.7 does not properly use the Perl Storable::thawfunction, which allows remote attackers to include and execute arbitrarylocal Perl files and possibly execute arbitrary code via unspecifiedvectors.

criterions.comment: movabletype-opensource: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
